import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useLanguage } from '../../context/LanguageContext'; import './ContactUs.css'; function ContactUs() { const { t } = useLanguage(); return (
{t('contactTitle')} {t('contactSubtitle')}
{/* Contact Form */}
{/* Contact Info */}

{t('contactInfo')}

{t('footerPhone')}

+90 (555) 123-4567

{t('footerEmail')}

info@detailinx.com

{t('visitUs')}

{t('footerAddressText')}

{t('workingHours')}

{t('footerWorkingDays')} {t('footerWorkingTime')}

{t('footerSunday')}

{t('footerFollow')}

); } export default ContactUs;
